name: RTCIceCandidatePairStats.circuitBreakerTriggerCount
description: The RTCIceCandidatePairStats property circuitBreakerTriggerCount indicates the number of times the circuit-breaker has been triggered to indicate a connection timeout or other unexpected connection abort on this specific connection configuration.

refs.name: Identifiers for WebRTC's Statistics API
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCIceCandidatePairStats.circuitBreakerTriggerCount' in Identifiers for WebRTC's Statistics API.
